title: Yankees Stave Off Elimination, Beat Astros in Game 5 of the ALCS
text:
As the New York Yankees dressed and prepared for an overnight flight to Houston late Friday, they had neither the time nor the cause to celebrate very much. They still trail the Astros, 3-2, in the best-of-seven American League Championship Series. But mere hours after it looked like their season could end with a whimper at Yankee Stadium, they had all they could reasonably hope for: another game to play.

After the Yankees held off elimination with a 4-1 win in Game 5, both teams had to scramble—first to get to the airport,...
description: The New York Yankees held off elimination with a 4-1 win over the Houston Astros in Game 5 of the ALCS.
